name: Tort
description: This cake was made on the highest mountain of the Kin Kong and made it way through the jungles of Savanna

name: RÃ¼hrkuchen
description: This cake was made from biscuits of Arsen, the greatest aboba

name: Cloudberry Delight
description: Crafted from the mythical cloudberries harvested atop the Misty Peaks during the golden sunrise.

name: Velvet Eclipse
description: A luxurious chocolate velvet cake, infused with stardust from the dark side of the Moon, perfect for dreamers.

name: Amber Honeycake
description: A soft, fluffy cake drizzled with honey collected by golden bees from the secret valleys of Eldoria.

name: Ocean Wave Tart
description: Infused with the essence of ocean breeze, this tart contains pearls of flavor harvested from the sapphire waters of Atlantida.

name: Crystal Berry Cake
description: Glistening with crystalized wild berries found deep in the Frostwood forest under the glow of the Northern Lights.

name: Dragonfruit Blaze
description: Baked over the roaring flames of a dragon's breath, this cake bursts with the exotic taste of fiery dragonfruit.

name: Sunset Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake layered with hues of mango and passionfruit, as vibrant as the sunsets of the Amaranth Coast.

name: Mystic Lavender Loaf
description: Infused with lavender petals plucked by moonlight, this loaf carries the calm whispers of the Enchanted Meadows.
